page.title: 16COPFORD TODAY PART ONE
page.content: The village of{Copford}is a pleasant place in which to live,a friendly and close{community.}Much of the beauty of the village still remains without being spoilt with overbuilding. I think of it as a square shaped{village bordered by School road,Church road,Copford Plains and the London road. Copford has much to offer for all ages. The Village Hall in School road is used by{many organisations.}For example there is Disco Dancing,Brownies - for the young: Women's Institute and Horticulture for the middle and older people:Drama Society for all ages thus there is always something going on. The{church}is an attraction to visitors with many historic features which the community is trying to preserve
